title: King and Queen meet Holocaust survivors at Buckingham Palace
description: King Charles III hosted the reception to mark Holocaust Memorial Day with survivors honoured in a series of specially commissioned portraits.
content:
King Charles III and Queen Camilla have met Holocaust survivors and lit candles of remembrance at Buckingham Palace to mark the anniversary of the liberation of Auschwitz-Birkenau.

title: Newborn dies after failures in maternity care at Ysbyty Gwynedd in Bangor
description: Sonny Taylor was "left distressed for a significant amount of time" before his birth, a report says.
content:
A newborn baby died after hospital staff failed to wake his mother for "potentially lifesaving observations" before his birth, an investigation has found.

title: ‘Lifelong friendships were tarnished by my horrible statements’: Kanye West elaborates on apology for antisemitism
description: Rapper and fashion mogul, legally known as Ye, gives details of mental health treatment and speaks of making amends with those in his personal life
content:
Kanye West has elaborated on his mindset during manic episodes in which he made strongly antisemitic comments.
On separate occasions, the rapper and fashion designer, legally known as Ye, had said “There’s a lot of things that I love about Hitler” an... [3377 chars]

title: Burnham accuses No 10 sources of lying about byelection decision
description: Manchester mayor suggests claims he was told Labour would not give him permission to stand were untrue
content:
The Labour party’s civil war over the Gorton and Denton byelection has intensified after Andy Burnham accused Downing Street sources of lying about his decision to apply to stand in the Manchester seat.

title: Boy, 14, charged over fatal e-scooter crash in Manchester
description: Jacob Calland, also 14 and a passenger on the e-scooter, died from the injuries he suffered in the collision in Wythenshawe.
content:
A 14-year-old boy has been charged with causing death by dangerous driving after a youngster died following a crash between the e-scooter they were riding and a car.
The incident happened in Wythenshawe last March, Greater Manchester Police said.
